getResolvedForNameSites

public java.util.Set<Pair<joeq.Compiler.Quad.Quad,java.util.Set<joeq.Class.jq_Reference>>> getResolvedForNameSites()
Provides a map from each java.lang.Class.forName(s) call site, whose argument s could be resolved, to the names of all classes to which it was resolved.
